mil.nga.giat.mage.sdk.preferences.ListVa.android:title: Time Interval
mil.nga.giat.mage.sdk.preferences.ListVa.android:summary: Minimum time interval between location updates. Smaller intervals will report your location more often regardless of distance moved.

mil.nga.giat.mage.sdk.preferences.ListVa.android:title: GPS Distance Sensitivity
mil.nga.giat.mage.sdk.preferences.ListVa.android:summary: Minimum distance between location updates. Smaller distances will give a more precise location at the cost of battery drain.
